title: UI Bug - Greyed out
body:
this has happened 5 times now, what is happening is sometimes the whole interface is glitching up, only way to explain it is when your accept decline appears and you cant click on anything in the back ground. well that what its like all over the screen. and its now done it twice in champ select making it unable to select a champ which has now lead me to a 10min main time. if this continues im not going to be able to play my account. i will print screen and update later.
also ive tried different keys to exit it, alt tabbing, locking the screen and unlocking, minimising and such. only thing i can do it alt/f4 to close it

replies.body: This only happens to me when I'm looking at the champion's details, abilities, etc. as soon as i close the window everything is greyed out and I can only exit it and reopen LoL.

This has happened to me several times now and it is sooo frustrating!! It doesn't just happen before games for me either it happens after them too. I now have to wait 15 minutes to play another game because I have had to close so many games! The screen just goes blurry and I cant do anything but close league :( This has only just happened after I updated the client this morning. I'm using windows 10 but I have heard others from windows 7 and 8 having the same problem.
